alerts.wait_message: We are orchestrating a new proposal. This may take a few seconds...
alerts.generation_dialogue_success_text: The dialogue lab has been updated with the new generated proposal.
alerts.generation_error_text: Could not connect to the AI engine. Please try again.

errors.not_found_desc: You haven't generated a version for this scenario yet. Use the button above to create one.

pedagogica_nota_text: Dialogues are generated based on the "Master Prompt". If results are not as expected, you can regenerate the version to get variations in avatar attitudes.
idempotente_text_part2: When saving a new version, the previous file will be replaced to maintain scenario integrity.
